name: United Kingdom
scope_notes: Prototype compliance mapping only. Always validate with FCA rules and UK counsel, especially for financial promotions and investor classification.
marketing_notes: Financial promotion rules apply; treat any public marketing as counsel-gated.
Confirm exemptions and investor type restrictions.
tokenization_notes: Tokenization may trigger securities promotion and custody considerations.
crypto_financing_notes: Crypto promotions and custody carry elevated regulatory and conduct risk.
